testcase.name: DontGiveModeArgs_shouldGiveHelpText

failure.message: Expected exception org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException but got org.testng.TestException: The exception was thrown with the wrong message: expected "Missing required option: javaclassprefix" but got "Missing required options: server, javaclassprefix"
